trans-unit.source: {2}: Enchanted Mountain becomes a 6/1 red Spirit creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

trans-unit.source: When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: When enchanted Mountain is put into a graveyard, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, CARDNAME gets +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, CARDNAME gets +3/+3.
